dataList.dlg: Hiya~ I’m Rodya. I have a longer name, but that makes things look cold, so just stick with Rodya~
Yawn~ Up already? I’m gonna get some more sleep. I hope someone makes me breakfast.
What’d you have for lunch? As for me, a juicy hunk of meat… was what I wanted, but Faust said no.
Having trouble sleeping? How about a round of poker with me? We’ll play heads-up. Fuhu.
People say you should shun money… but that’s a load of crap. Sure, worshipping money is a highway to disaster, but when you’re a lover of money like me, you’re set for success.
You gotta take it easy with the work, Dante. Everyone needs a break from time to time. …Why don’t you go out and buy me some sweets, then. Hm?
My favorite things… Taking a bite of premium meat and playing card games. And I’ll be the winner no matter what we play.
My hometown was freezing cold. This is a total greenhouse compared to that. Sometimes feels a little too warm, though. What about yours, Dante? Oh, right… Tell me when you remember, ‘kay?
You really are an odd one, Dante, darling. How can you stand living such a boring life? Did you forget all about your favorite stuff when you lost your head? If so, that’s… Yeah, that’s kinda sad…
Dante? Are you out shopping? Can I count on you to get me some grub?
Need a hand?
Let’s get this done quickly and get some snackage~
What? Did you miss me?
Be back in a jiffy~
Is that all?
Ngh…!
Score! You owe me a treat, Dante~
Oh, gee… You’ve got some work cut out for you, Dante~
I bet the others woulda gone bust.
Bah~ I warned ya.
Piece of cake~ Y’know I’m looking forward to a bigger reward than compliments… Ya dig?
Perrrrrfection! Heck, I might even say that was below my level.
You coulda done better~ Just saying, not my fault.
